title: Texas Abortion Law Gives a Glimpse Into a Post-Roe World
sub_head: State provides window into what antiabortion advocates hope, and abortion-rights proponents fear, could spread nationwide
body:
AUSTIN, Texas—Over nine weeks, a new Texas law effectively banning abortion after six weeks has transformed the state’s abortion climate.
The number of abortions performed in clinics has dropped. Some women have carried out their own abortions, such as one woman who took drugs she purchased from overseas. Others, including a 13-year-old assault victim, have fled Texas to other states, where clinics say they are overwhelmed by Texas demand.
